title: Apsara Bangle: Emerald & Ruby Floral Kada
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and enhanced gold tone.
features: Intricate floral design with a central cabochon emerald surrounded by a halo of vibrant rubies and sparkling CZ stones. The bangle showcases delicate filigree work and a secure hinge closure for easy wear. Features a pink enamel accent. The floral motif is reminiscent of the ashtadal lotus (అష్టదళ పద్మం), symbolizing purity and prosperity.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant emerald green
occasions: and traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham or half-saree functions (Voni Function). Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary ensembles.
description: This exquisite bangle blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary wearability. The vibrant gemstone combination of emeralds and rubies signifies prosperity and good fortune. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using time-honored techniques, ensuring exceptional quality and durability. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making it a lasting treasure.
